introText: The Ministry of Colleges and Universities supports Ontario's post-secondary education system, ensuring accessible, high-quality higher education and research opportunities for students and institutions.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of Colleges and Universities spent $13.2B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 6.4% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports universities, colleges, student financial aid, and research initiatives.
roleText: This ministry is essential for Ontario's economic competitiveness and innovation, supporting post-secondary institutions that educate the workforce, conduct research, and drive technological advancement across the province.
programsDescription: The Ministry of Colleges and Universities operates programs including university and college operating grants, student financial assistance, research funding, capital infrastructure support, and Indigenous education initiatives.
